Projects

Here are some projects I've worked on:

  • Starlight [source] ‘hackable’ voice command assistant written in Python using Google’s Text-to-speech apis, designed to run on linux/unix enviornments
  • MERN material ui [source] responsive boilerplate using Material UI and MERN (MongoDB, Express🚉, React, Node) to create a login system (hashing, salting, encrypted requests) with material design
  • ghost-tufte [source] 👻 fantastic looking Ghost blog theme styled after Edward Tufte CSS 👩‍🎨.
  • Java-Net☕️ [source] a neural network built from scratch in Java–has its own full-fledged matrix library.
  • newcomen [source] slick and minimal jekyll blog theme for writers/programmers (this website is using the theme)

More will be added to this page soon!
